title: Ice Angel (On Thin Ice: Going for the Gold) (2000) DVDRip
description:
Ice Angel (On Thin Ice: Going for the Gold) (2000) DVDRip
A popular hockey player dies and is reborn as a woman and becomes a figure skater. 

A star hockey player becomes a casualty of a wayward puck and finds that even divine intervention can be a hit or miss when he is awarded a second chance at life and the Olympics in the romantic comedy, ON THIN ICE: GOING FOR THE GOLD.
Matt Clark (Aaron Smolinski), the dedicated and driving force behind one of the world's top hockey teams, has everything to live for - an excellent shot of competing in the next Olympics and a beautiful girlfriend he plans to marry. But destiny takes a turn - Matt is hit in the head with a hockey puck. When he awakens, he is shocked to find himself in a transition station between Earth and the afterlife. Will he get a second chance?
